Blackstorm:

Blackstorm waited until Maxima stayed close to her, then she move to 
a side in the last second and moved a leg in that way that she could 
fall.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/26/03 11:39:13 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Blackstorm moved quickly  back but Maxima's tail caught her, she 
> > felll but quickly she sat down and shot against MAxima two 
energy 
> > balls
> > 
> > 
> 
> "Good!" she then jumped back as she whipped the energy balls, 
zapping one, 
> but the other hit at her feet. Knocking Maxima off her feet, but 
she flipped 
> back & landed on her feet in a crouch. 
> 
> Putting away her whip tail, she pulled out 2 cylinders that 
activated into 
> energy swords. Then leapt at Blackstorm with speed & grace.
